It'll be alright, kiddo. These people ar: Welcome to Armitage, child of Donar. I am an official of the Donari Temple. We heard of fierce battles outside the capital. Thank Donar you've arrived safely.
도나르의 아이여, 아미티지에 온 것을 환영한단다. 나는 도나리 교단의 대표자야. 수도 밖에서 치열한 전투가 있었다고 들었는데. 도나르께서 보우하사, 네가 안전히 도착해 다행이구나.

It'll be alright, kiddo. These people ar: ...What do you need me to do, sir?

Oh... nothing, nothing. That is to say, simply make yourself comfortable here in Armitage. Some acolytes of the Sisterhood of Mercy will tend to your needs.\! When the time comes, just follow along as they guide you through the process.\! By the end of today, it is very likely that you will be sanctioned to be Veridia's Empress.
